name: Harris_County_Appraisal_District
description: Description of the variables in the data from HCAD, with information on the sources.

resources.description: Data obtained from the HCAD Real & Personal Property Database which can be found at http://pdata.hcad.org/download/2014.html

fields.name: HCAD_NUM
fields.description: A unique 13 digit account number. Source: Parcels.shp

fields.name: BLK_NUM
fields.description: No description available Source: Parcels.shp.

fields.name: LOT_NUM
fields.description: No description available. Source: Parcels.shp

fields.name: CONDO_FLAG
fields.description: Indicates if the parcel is stacked. A value of 1 means stacked, and a value of 0 means it's not stacked. Stacked parcels are used for condos, undivided interest accounts, and pure accounts. Source: Parcels.shp

fields.name: parcel_typ
fields.description: No description available. Source: Parcels.shp

fields.name: CurrOwner
fields.description: Name of the property's current owner. Source: Parcels.shp

fields.name: LocAddr
fields.description: The street address of the property. Source: Parcels.shp

fields.name: city
fields.description: The city the property is located in. Source: Parcels.shp

fields.name: zip
fields.description: The 4 digit zip code of the property. Source: Parcels.shp

fields.name: LocNum
fields.description: The number from the property's street address. Source: Parcels.shp

fields.name: LocName
fields.description: Name of the street the property is located on. Source: Parcels.shp

fields.name: LOT_NUM
fields.description: No description available.

fields.name: Shape_area
fields.description: No description available.

fields.name: Shape_len
fields.description: No description available.

fields.name: valid
fields.description: If the property's geometry is valid then 'Valid Geometry' is stated. Source: Parcels.shp

fields.name: COUNTY
fields.description: The county the property is located in. Source: Parcels.shp

fields.name: TRACT
fields.description: The tract the property is located in. Source: Parcels.shp

fields.name: ACCOUNT
fields.description: A unique 13 digit account number. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: USE_CODE
fields.description: A description of the property's use. A list of use codes can be found at http://pdata.hcad.org/Desc/2018/code_desc_real.txt under State Class. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: BUILDING_NUMBER
fields.description: Indicates the building number associated with the account because accounts can be applied to multiple buildings. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: IMPRV_TYPE
fields.description: A description of the type of building. A list of codes can be found at http://pdata.hcad.org/Desc/2018/code_desc_real.txt under Building Type Code (Improv_tp). Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: BUILDING_STYLE_CODE
fields.description: A description of the building's style. A list of codes can be found at http://pdata.hcad.org/Desc/2018/code_desc_real.txt under Building Style. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: CLASS_STRUCTURE
fields.description: A description of the general building type. Options include 'A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'M', 'R', and 'S'. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: CLASS_STRUC_DESCRIPTION
fields.description: A description of the CLASS_STRUCTURE codes. Options include 'Fireproofed Steel', Reinforced Concrete', 'Masonry Bearing', 'Wood or Light Steel', 'Mobile Home', 'Residential', 'Open Steel Skeleton'. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: DEPRECIATION_VALUE
fields.description: The amount the property's value has declined. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: CAMA_REPLACEMENT_COST
fields.description: No description available. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: ACCRUED_DEPR_PCT
fields.description: Accumulated depreciation percent. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: QUALITY
fields.description: A description of the building's quality. Options include 'A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E', 'F', 'X'. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: QUALITY_DESCRIPTION
fields.description: A description of the QUALITY codes. Options include 'Excellent', 'Good', 'Average', 'Low', 'Very Low', 'Poor', and 'Superior'. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: DATE_ERECTED
fields.description: Year the building was made. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
fields.description: Year buiding was first used. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: YR_REMODEL
fields.description: Year the building was remodeled. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: YR_ROLL
fields.description: No description available. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: APPRAISED_BY
fields.description: No description available. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: APPRAISED_DATE
fields.description: Date the building was appraised. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: NOTE
fields.description: Any extra descriptions or information about the building. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: IMPR_SQ_FT
fields.description: No description available. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: ACTUAL_AREA
fields.description: Base area of residential buildings. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: HEAT_AREA
fields.description: Living area of residential buildings. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: GROSS_AREA
fields.description: Usually the same as ACTUAL_AREA except for 1 and 1/2 story houses. Commercial properties do not use GROSS_AREA. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: EFFECTIVE_AREA
fields.description: No description available. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: BASE_AREA
fields.description: No description available. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: PERIMETER
fields.description: Perimeter of building. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: PERCENT_COMPLETE
fields.description: No description available. Source: building_other.txt and building_res.txt

fields.name: NBHD_FACTOR
fields.description: No description available. Source: building_res.txt

fields.name: RCNLD
fields.description: No description available. Source: building_res.txt

fields.name: SIZE_INDEX
fields.description: No description available. Source: building_res.txt

fields.name: LUMP_SUM_ADJ
fields.description: No description available. Source: building_res.txt

fields.name: geometry
fields.description: The parcel's geometry. Source: Parcels.shp

fields.name: NOTICED_DEPR_VALUE
fields.description: No description available. Source: building_other.txt

fields.name: MS_REPLACEMENT_COST
fields.description: No description available. Source: building_other.txt

fields.name: CATEGORY
fields.description: A description of the building's use. Options include NA, blanks, 04-12, 16-26, and 28. Source: building_other.txt

fields.name: CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION
fields.description: A description of the CATEGORY codes. Options include 'Office', 'Rtl-Community Shopping Ctr', 'Warehouse - Distribution', 'Warehouse - Office', 'Warehouse - Mini', 'Rtl - Strip Shopping Ctr', 'Rtl - Nghbrhood Shopping Ctr', 'Medical', 'Rtl - Power Centers', 'Apartments - High Rise', 'Apartments - Garden Style', 'Apartments - Tax Credit Housing', 'Apartments - Subsidized Housing', 'Rtl - Multi Occupancy', 'Warehouse - Service Ctr/Flex', 'Malls', 'Hotels, Full Service', 'Motels\Limited Service Hotels', 'Parking Garages', 'Department Stores', 'Extended Stay Hotel-Motel'. Source: building_other.txt

fields.name: PROPERTY_NAME
fields.description: Name of the property. Source: building_other.txt

fields.name: UNITS
fields.description: The number of living units available in the building. Source: building_other.txt

fields.name: NET_RENT_AREA
fields.description: No description available. Source: building_other.txt

fields.name: LEASE_RATE
fields.description: The cost to rent. Source: building_other.txt

fields.name: OCCUPANCY
fields.description: Ratio of rented spaces to total available spaces. Source: building_other.txt

fields.name: TOTAL_INCOME
fields.description: Total income obtained from the occupants' rent. Source: building_other.txt
